answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hello, Rex.  I have found several local governments which put out new resident packets containing various types of information.
Janesville, Wisconsin: http://www.ci.janesville.wi.us/index.aspx?page=166
Woodbury, Minnesota: http://www.ci.woodbury.mn.us/house-home-and-pets-sp/new-resident-information
Raymore, Missouri: http://www.raymore.com/index.aspx?NID=359
I hope this information helps!
Gabe Brehm
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA

author: Rex Taylor
text: I would like to know if any cities prepare and distribute new resident information packets, and if so, what type of information you put in them?
title: New Resident Information Packet
